summary: Diff updates the Upload tab empty-state to use a new PATENTED round logo path and adds a combined flip+continuous-rotation Tailwind animation with reduced-motion support. However, the required static asset file was not added (no added files), and there are unrelated/contra-request changes (notably AppHeader branding/layout and other behavior changes). Evidence is insufficient to confirm the requested PDF/in-app text-overlap fixes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix PDF export layout so no text overlaps anywhere (header, footer, table cells) and multi-page exports remain readable with consistent margins/spacing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix in-app UI formatting issues that can cause text overlap (non-PDF), adjusting spacing/wrapping/alignment responsively, keeping user-facing text in English.

evidence: BuildRequest constraint: "do not replace the app header logo" / REQ-61 AC: "No changes are made to the app header logo sizing/branding"
